name: Pixel Veggies - Healthy Choice
description:
Slide your finger through the veggies to combine them and complete missions.

Your mission is collect the number of veggies in each level.

Be fast when the level is based on time and when the level is based on number of movements, calculate exactly what movement will be the best.

Note: All doctors confirm that the intake of veggies will gain a perfect health.
We recommend a daily dose of at least three levels of Pixel Veggies.
